content:
Hi everyone,

We are implementing PDEX PlanNet and we see a search parameter with type special:
https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/SearchParameter-location-contains.html

I wasn't able to find any information about type special in HL4 FHIR documentation and I can't find an example with expression Location.extension.where(url='http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/location-boundary-geojson') in your list of examples.

Could you please provide more info about this type and describe how it must work?

Search parameters are being worked on.
We are 'probably' adding a geojson extension to Location (just like VhDir had).
Not sure whether the contains searchParameter will make the cut....stay tuned.
I opened a Jira ticket to make sure that this didn't fall through. the cracks -- https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-27763

THANKS!
